# anchorIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The identifier of the AR anchor with which the anchor entity is associated, or `nil` if it isn’t currently anchored.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var anchorIdentifier: UUID? { get }
```
title: anchorIdentifier
